svg.title: Simplified plan and massing model of Absolute World Tower 1
svg.desc: Simplified plan and massing model of Tower 1 of Absolute World residential condominium in Ontario, drawn by CMG Lee based on http://archello.com/en/project/absolute-towers-1 , http://peruarki.com/the-absolute-towers and http://openstreetmap.org/?lat=43.595;lon=-79.635;zoom=99 .
